headline: Rachel's Creamy Rice Pudding
name: Rachel's Creamy Rice Pudding
description: Using delicate Carolina gold rice adds extra fluffiness to this simple, creamy rice pudding that's thickened with eggs and kissed with vanilla and raisins.
recipeIngredient: 2 quarts whole milk, or more as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Place milk, rice, and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender, 20 to 25 minutes.

Beat eggs in a bowl. Add a small amount of the rice mixture to the eggs to temper them. Pour mixture into the pot; add raisins and vanilla extract. Let cook until thickened, 15 to 20 minutes more. Add more milk if pudding gets too thick. Pour into a serving bowl and sprinkle cinnamon on top.
